CustomField.description: Updated help text and added process to auto populate this field through request R164212. Updated per R152784
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Auto calculates to: 'Average O/V Payment X # of Owners/Vendors x 1.5' when Record Type = APM Payments & Outbound On-Boarding Status=Pending Peer Review. Auto updates only one time upon meeting criteria & can be manually updated before/after auto update.
CustomField.label: Outbound Single Day Amount
